dead_outsider_J1: This isn't what I expected from the afterlife. Was this what you were hoping for?
dead_outsider_J2: I don't know why you can see me. It kind of freaks me out.
dead_outsider_J3: I don't think it's fair that I'm over here, and you're not.
Maybe there's some way I could sneak you in..?
No, no, I couldn't do that. If I do, they might kick me out...
dead_outsider_J4: Clans are cruel. This wouldn't be happening to you if you just left.
dead_outsider_J5: [t_c butts their ghostly head against yours.]
[You can't tell if being able to see them as a ghost makes you more happy or sad.]
[Their pelt is translucent, lacking any colour or feeling...]
[You miss the living t_c. So, so much.]
dead_outsider_J6: I'm sorry for your loss, y_c.
Clanmates... they really care for each other, don't they?
dead_outsider_J7: How awful must I have been, to end up in the hell for a belief that I didn't even hold?
Guess I'd better start learning some of this 'Clan' stuff. Hey, wanna teach me?
dead_outsider_J8: Do you StarClan cats think this is funny? You enjoy sending helpless cats to purgatory forever, even when they're not from a Clan?
I don't belong here. I've seen the ghosts that wander the living world. I'm supposed to be one of them.
dead_outsider_J9: Wanna swap places? I'll be a ghost, and you can join your Clan's afterlife. It's not fair for either of to be where we are, anyhow.
What? It's only fair! Come on!
dead_outsider_J11: How did you get over here? Is there an open spot at the border? Can you show me?
dead_outsider_J13: An outsider and a kit in the Dark Forest.
I think these 'StarClan' cats need to take a good look at who it really is they're sending to purgatory.
dead_outsider_J16: [You turn your head when you hear a small yelp. t_c is slowly floating towards you, nearly a tail-length off of the ground. Their paws are swinging wildly in the air as they try to ground themselves.]
[Though you weren't sure it would, their ghostly pelt reacts to your touch and you're able to gently push them back onto the ground.]
Whoa! Thanks, Clancat! That was super scary.
It was kind of fun, though... I'm gonna try again.
dead_urourside_c1: I've always wondered how Clans worked. Do you know anything about them, y_c?
dead_urourside_c2: I've never been able to see this area when I was alive. Those Clan cats always chased me away before I could take a closer look.
dead_urourside_c3: [t_c easily navigates the maze of Twoleg dens, leaping from fence to fence reminiscent of the way Clan cats jump through trees.]
dead_uroutside_c4: [Alarmed, you sprint over to where the commotion is.]
[You find t_c stomping on an ant colony, but their paws pass harmlessly through them.]
alive_urourside_c: I've always wondered how Clans worked. Can you tell me more about them?
scnew_urnew_R1: [Oh? Who is that? You toddle closer curiously.]
[You're friends now. The day is spent napping together.]
scnew_urnew_R2: [You've met a strange new kit who smells weird.]
[You both spend time sniffing and scrunching your noses at each other before calling an apparent truce.]
[You toddle away first when a queen spots you.]
scnew_urnew_R3: [You decide to mew back, and soon there is a volley of tiny squeaks echoing softly between the two of you.]
scnew_urnew_R4: [A queen has noticed a strange newborn amongst the regulars. You already knew t_c was there.]
[You snuggle closer to them, laying your tiny head on the small of their back.]
[The queen can't bring themselves to separate you two for the moment.]
sckit_urnew_R3: Mew. Mew. Mew. Mew. Mew. Mew. Meeeew.
[Is that... t_c? Aren't they a kittypet? You heard one of the queens say that before.]
[They're mewing with each step as they go past. Maybe they're counting...?]
[t_c toddles off, unaware of the existential thoughts going through your head because of them.]
sckit_urnew_R4: [In the middle of a scavenger hunt, you stumble across t_c!]
[... Well... It wouldn't hurt to have a friend to join you!]
[You pick up t_c and help them tag along for the game. You don't win, but they seemed to have had lots of fun, and that makes it worth it!]
[You take them back to the border with a cheerful goodbye.]
sckit_urnew_R5: [One of the queens asks you for a favor since they're alone with the newborns right now. t_c has wandered in, but it's time for them to go home.]
[The little kittypet wriggles as you struggle to carry them to the border.]
dead_outsider_J18: [You wonder what t_c is doing here when they don't smell like a Clan cat.]
you_living_they_outsider_sc_CM1: [t_c is staring around them, their eyes wide as they watch starry-pelted cats walk by. Suddenly, they turn to you, seeming surprised.]
Oh! t_c! Are you -- No, it's not your time yet.
[You slowly recognize that this is a cat that you've never seen nor heard of before. You gently question why they're here.]
I don't know, but no one seems to mind.
No matter that I wasn't one of you in life, if I ended up here... It must be my duty to protect you.
